q_en: The expected completion date for cutting task 33 needs to be extended to July 31, 2024.

steps.sql: SELECT end_time FROM cutting_tasks WHERE id = 33;
steps.description: Retrieve the current end time for the cutting task with ID 33

steps.sql: UPDATE cutting_tasks SET end_time = '2024-07-31 23:59:59' WHERE id = 33;
steps.description: Update the end time for the cutting task with ID 33 to July 31, 2024
